Text: so far ... sample looks ok ... downloading now will comment again when finished

Some details are lost, but the overall video quality is good. The audio gets out of synch a bit towards the end, but it also clear.
Thanks for this!

I've found that if the audio gets out of sinc, sometimes when I exit the player then resume playback, it seems to correct itself 8/10 times. have seen this happen with multiple movies, but when burned the problem does'nt occur on the disc at all.
